name: Enquiry for WooCommerce, WooCommerce Product catalog,Website
author: BEEPIXL

sections.installation:
1. Make sure your WordPress site are installed WooCommerce.
  2. Install and activate this plugin.
  3. Go to /wp-admin, on WooCommerce menu, click WPEnquiry.
  4. Your button is ready.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • New Feature Updates

1.0.0

  • Release to WordPress Plugin Directory.
sections.description:
Enquiry For Products

The Enquiry for Products plugin adds an enquiry button to product. Using this customer can send you an enquiry or request a quote for a product.

Enquiry for Products plugin features

  • Show Enquiry Button on Shop/Category page and Single Product page
  • Enquiry for Products can have enquiry on whatsapp as well as facebook
  • Change the Text shown in the Enquiry Button
  • Change the background and text color of the button
  • Add Floating Enquiry Button
  • Change Floating Background Color
  • Change Icon Color
  • Change Button position left or right
  • Enable Disable Floating button

Enquiry For Products WhatsApp Settings

  • Add WhatsApp number with Country code
  • Change icon and text color
  • Add a whatsapp button in single product page or for all products in shop
  • Set a default message
